allot of people claiming they do not use cheats but they are the pre-fireing is too at point and no one is is perfect every shot. valves anti cheat vac is slow and not smart enough to catch on. i played games comp with people who move faster then any one else and that glide through walls. i played getting head shot through walls i must say valve has not done enough for a game they clearly make lots of money off. the anti cheat could be allot better.  this game is fun but no when you get match with mean players or cheaters. any one who says else are most likely the ones cheating.

Really fun game. The only real drawback is that it's a team-based strategy game and 95% of the people playing have no F'n clue what that means, so they run into the line of fire and die quickly. 

Pro Tip: If you have the bomb, don't run out in front. Hang back and see if your team is successful with their push. If you run out front, you'll die quickly and give the opposing team an easy way to pick off your teammates trying to get the bomb back.
